This post displays a stable attributional style because it attributes the individual's negative emotions and experiences (feeling sad, lonely, and considering suicide) to chronic, stable factors (neglect and abandonment by others, feeling unheard and unsupported). The transferred post suggests that the difficulties are not inherent to the individual's life but are instead due to external circumstances that can be changed.
